column1: Little Goat Diner////This review is only in regards to the bar as I did not eat here. However
column2: I ordered the cocktail Hoopoe's hope and it was delicous. It was so freshing and tasted of peaches and lemon. I had 2 in fact. I am really picky about drinks but this drink was a winner. However
column3: my husband had an old fashioned and he thought it was kind of meh. He likes the ones at Bavette's better. Anyways
column4: we will have to come back to try the food
column5: but I really liked the layout of the space.
